durang:
1
Nedar Burujolare Siṛimi chi Siruṅ.
Ginataególaya ॥koṅ॥
Kana ṉhapui Siṛimi, kanah ṉhapui Siruṅ,
Baleć misińtańe Chana ginataególoya ॥koṅ॥²

2
Sasaṅakan Piḍingire, sunumakan Piḍingire.
Baleć mising tańe chana kitaṕ saṭao tan ॥koṅ॥
Ṉocha re Dikuṉhon, Ṉhora ṉaṅkirvaićmea.
Misińere murukuṅ nelsenoḱtea ॥koṅ॥²

3
Kákasakam tinjarbonjar,
Chekan kili tana jam dinḍa napanum ॥koṅ॥²
Kili kam jagar redo,
Nayaṅ kili ² teṅ kili misa meh ॥koṅ॥²

4
Hesaā mata matalena baḍi mata matalena(ṭik samay rege
Tuyum seṭer akana) ॥koṅ॥²
Hesaā mata ² chaba jana baḍi mata ² chaba jana
Sama gea tuyum bonḍo l akana ॥koṅ॥²
Nale noṛaā re tuyu seta menay(hakaka bakaka tana
Tuyu kakiṛi mea) ॥koṅ॥²

5
Mising racha bahakara kiṭubakan tiru akana ॥koṅ॥²
ṭapa ṭapa baduṛi, ṭapa gasar ket́ ॥koṅ॥²

6
Nimiṅ jeṭe nimiṅ lolo
Nen nuli sakam don akana gasaro ॥koṅ॥
Bale kimiń seṭer lena,
Nen nuli sakam don akana gasaro ॥koṅ॥

7
Latarete jugi Hon, chetanete jugi hona.
 'koy ' koyate jugim seṭer lena ॥koṅ॥²
Negayaṅ goṛe menae recha,
Napuiṅ goṛe menae recha,
 'koye, koyedo jugi nonah koyado noma meh ॥koṅ॥²

8
Daḱ do daḱ do tetaṅhi tan,
Lai do lai do rengehi tana.
Nokon kore dudulūm daḱ do beṭaoha.koṅ.
Chimin saning chimin jiling,
Nokon reja dudulūm daḱ do beṭaoha ॥koṅ॥
Daṅh do beṭao hametam,
Diri sut́, rūgut́ sut́ dah do beṭaoha ॥koṅ॥²

9
Munḍa koh rachare, santa koh rachare,
Kuṭura chi muta riṛi hekena.koṅ.²
Kana napui kuṭura, akana napui muta,
Munḍa kore talaṕ ṭaka riḍiṅ hekena ॥koṅ॥²

10
Burū bhitar maghe, beḍa bhitar maghe,
Chikatere daṛachu naiu mehaleleṛa ॥koṅ॥²
Rūtu riu ² teṅh nayum mele ḍah ॥koṅ॥
Banam cheo ² teṅh nayum mele ḍah॥

11
Neder piṛi ² t akan sari baṅ, kalai ba nerainelaḍah ॥koṅ॥²
Gono sati menah rechalaṅ keā ruāi॥

12
Naben dona bale bareh,
Rūtu tedo, banam tedo nesum rasika ॥koṅ॥²
Rūtu te do banam te kaben nasulo ॥koṅ॥

13
Negay, napui mena redo,
Baṛi darū lidi ² sua riṅ ॥koṅ॥²
Nengay, napui bangay,
Baṛi daru lidi ², doṛa he jana ॥koṅ॥²

14
Naben doja bale bareng,
Kenjar bonjar raja doben beṭa taya chi.koṅ.²
Beṭa ṛoliṅ beṭa taya,
Samaṛam ganḍū rinki rakaṕ akana ॥koṅ॥²

15
Buru maghe chabahana, beṛa maghe chaba hana,
Chigo chekan teben tol gojena.koṅ.²
Niha tinge sanaṅh,
Baṭa baṭi burū re baṭi gojen ben.koṅ.²

16
Nender burū jolare,
Jiki china, sarasanḍi manḍa rakab let́a ॥koṅ॥
Kana napui jiki, akana napui sarasanḍi,
Bale bareṅh cha metam manḍa rakaṕ leṛa ॥koṅ॥

17
Chia chia chepar Hon, chia chia guturahona.
Haga ko disu meh do bugi tana chia ॥koṅ॥
Sukuge bano, dukūge
Maḍako bir kore ko bakaṛa tana ॥koṅ॥²

18
Naben doja bale bareg, buru bhitar reaṛi benaniro niriya,
Noro mata le redo, jangi mata le redo,
Mage rea dhoti doben kirĩya chi ॥koṅ॥²
Kaben kirĩya redo, kaben kejanay redo,
Naben geda balego barey disum tumio ॥koṅ॥

19
Chetan pukari chel chopol,
Latar pukari chel chola.
Baṅ lekan naku kiṅ rakaṕe lena ॥koṅ॥²
Jĩbhiri menahḱ recha laṅ, jibhiri koṭoūṅ kiṅ ॥koṅ॥²
Raba mena recha laṅ, raba koṭoūṅ kiṅ ॥koṅ॥²

20
Bareng racha kadam daru,
Kadam daru chetanete da do joro tana ॥koṅ॥²
Daḱ do telae ben bareng,
Sona rūpa tiṛite da, do telae ben ॥koṅ॥²

21
Jiṛim suku jan redo;
Boṛo reā baṛa napanum baṛa nemańe meh |k koṅ॥²
Jiṛi karem suku jan redo,
Boṛo reā baṛa napanum nalom nemaṅiaṅ ॥koṅ॥²

22
Chetano ko mag akana, lataro ko mag akana,
Nokonare juṛilang mage misana ॥koṅ॥²
Mage misana lang juṛiṅ,
Bala saka nature lang mage misana ॥koṅ॥²

23
Munḍa ko racha kadam daru,
Jeṭe tichi lolate moyalan tana ॥koṅ॥²
Kana napui jeṭe te, akana napui lolate,
Samay bapui seno tanate, moyalan tan |k koṅ.॥²

24
Disumedo gule gule, raṅnachi do mele mele,
Disum kochi bareng ben niatintana |k koṅ.॥²

25
Naling doja bale bareng
Sirima jeṭe, note lolo riliaṅ ॥koṅ॥²
Naben doja bale bareng,
Mant́ ko bhitar juṅbulae nubul rebena ॥koṅ॥²

26
Chetan pukari, latar pukari,
Maena moh nakukiṅ rakabelena ॥koṅ॥²
Nasulikiṅ ben go bareng,
Bugin ² jagadare nasulikiṅ ben ॥koṅ॥²
Gonoākiṅ ben go bareng,
Ikoisi baisi kore gonoākiṅ ben ॥koṅ॥²

27
Buru bhitar mage do, pata bhitar mage do,
Dili kulań ben go bareng, kaji kulań ben ॥koṅ॥²
Kaben dili kulań redo, kaben kaji kulań redo,
Baṭa baṭi buru rea baṭi gojena ॥koṅ॥
Tole tole buru reṅa tol gojena ॥koṅ॥²

28
Niyang tikiṅ napung tikiṅ mena redo,
Chiṭi kireṅ maḍi, nūtū dul akana ॥koṅ॥²
Niyang tikiṅ napui tikiṅ bang kiṅā,
Chiṭi ki re maḍi nūtū noṭang jana ॥koṅ॥²

29
Chetan kunḍi, latar kunḍi
Doneha chi masala leko chenḍo tana
Kana napui donea, akana napui masala,
Bareng here beneṭa leko chenḍo tana ॥koṅ॥²

30
Nuli chuṭūkay riya bareng
Nisir chenḍo do.
Jagada daaḱ riya bareng
Keḱ ye baṭa do.
Guli tuṭi menaḱ redo bareng,
Tuyanja lopoṅ tai mea bale bareng ॥koṅ॥²

31
Nengaṅe napuṅe mena redo,
Nuli ḍumasū ḍumba, kuda ḍumasū ḍumba nuṅbal nerĩāḱ
Negaṅe napuṅe bangaya,
Nuli ḍumasū ḍumba, kuda ḍumasū ḍumba,
Numbul goyo natu ḍing ॥koṅ॥²

32
Nape disum do munḍa,
Dirisut́ bonj raja dado niji tan ॥koṅ॥²
Nale disum do munḍa,
Pataa gasar jan redo dado ranjeḍo |k koṅ.॥²

33
Hatu kuṭi uli daru,
Meaḍege jo len esu sibila.
Mata somay hoao redo, jome samay hoao redo,
Kagajo sakame re ole kulaeṅ bena.
Kam ole kulaeṅ redo, kam dili kulaeṅ redo,
Baṭa baṭi buru reṅ baṭṭi gojena॥
Heleke teke buru reṅ tol gojena ॥koṅ॥

34
Kam toṭ akan reó, kam sangar ken reó,
Laṛata jilūm nela rem tabu tabuya.
Nisai sarige chakat́ bano,
Laḍata jilūm nela rem tabu tabuya ॥koṅ॥

35
Neang napuṅi ṭai kenare,
Bangali dhoti chaeṅ tega tegaya.
Neang napui bage kiḍing,
Seer lija botoe botoy akana ॥koṅ॥

36
Maghe paraṕ hoba lena,
Nen reching nu nuā tehareṅ nu nuā ॥koṅ॥

37
Manḍi doko Manḍi tana, rebe rebe,
Nili doko chala tana choṭo choṭo,
Nicha baṛa juṛig do meḍe jolopi ॥koṅ॥²

38
Buddhi netoy-ālaṅ misiṅ,
Chiṭi miṭi bangalare buddhi netoy ālaṅ.
Buddhi neto kere misiṅ, diri lekan se laṭilaṅ nobor ket́a॥
Jaṭi lekan kagajolaṅ nitir ket́a॥
Buddhi neto kere misiṅ,
Nende nonol punḍi kagajo disum jari ket́ ॥koṅ॥

39
Nam dona bareṅ negam menai,
Nam dona bare napūm menai,
Sadae jor balego bareṅ, chatom numbūl rem ॥koṅ॥
Nań dona bareṅ nengay bangae,
Nań dona bareṅ napūiṅ bagay,
Sadae jor balego bareṅ, jibon jeṭe loloreh ॥koṅ॥
Nańonga nengay menay redo, nańoga naṅpūi menay redo,
Sadae jor balego bareṅ jiban chatom numbūl reh ॥koṅ॥

40
Neṭeḍiṅhatanagoṅm bare, neṭeḍiṅh-tanama.
Mihaḍege misim tem neṭeḍiṅh-tana ॥koṅ॥
Chabūṛa tańabenago bareṅ chabūṛatań ben,
Gelebar doreare chabūṛatań ben ॥koṅ॥
Chapa natū̃i benago bareṅ, chapa natuiṅ ben,
Nilabaṛi kagajore chapa natūiṅ bena.
Meḍadaham joroy-hago bareṅ, meḍadaham joroyaha,
Chapa sakam nel kete meḍadaham joroyaha ॥koṅ॥

41
Buddhim neto tan go bareṅ,
Binihūr nisikūlareh buddhim ne to tana.koṅ.
ṭibūl bil akanago bareṅ,
āikorṭ bagaṅlare ṭibūl bilakana.
ṭibūl chetan rena bareṅ,
Sona reha kagajo bilanakah naha.koṅ.
Buddhim neto lereṅ bareṅ,
Sonareha pĩsilate nomboratuimeha.koṅ.

42
Chetan pukari latar pukari,
Napū̃i gecha roṛa let́ joṛa nūli bah.koṅ. Dhūḱ si0॥
Baṛay nasitan bareṅ,
Nede nende sepeṛet́ baṛay nasitan.koṅ. Siḱ dhū0॥
Baṛago nemaiḱ ben bareṅ,
Tiṛigo chetan biṛiteh baṛagoh nemaiben.koṅ. Siḱ dhū0॥

43
Surūgo sutam dogo bareṅ gutuihalang,
Chigo bareṅ galańalang.koṅ.
Buddhim neto tanago bareṅ,
Kumpani duhare buddhim netotana.koṅ.
Nisirakanagom bareṅ, surū sutam galaṅ hankan,
Nisira ka nam.koṅ.

44
Jeṭe singi seṭer lena,
Koto koto baha lena jenga jūṛi bah.koṅ. Dhūḱ si0॥
Ji, ge, soṛanago metam,
Mūtūḍa mūtūḍa ji, ge, lalacho.koṅ.siḱ dhū0॥

45
Nengay napūiṅ ṭai kena,
Gete gete senehor tala riliṅ ha ॥koṅ॥
Nengay napūiṅ baṅ kiha,
Gete gete senehor tisaratūḍiń ॥koṅ॥

46
Gaṛako nasi ludam baṛa,
Chiminete misiṅ koben jagaray ha ॥koṅ॥
Gutūi āchim galańa,
Chiminete misiṅ koben kajiāya ha ॥koṅ॥
Jahogeh metam jahogeh,
Nijū seno ha ॥koṅ॥
Jahogeh metam jahogeh,
Jagaratū̃i ha ॥koṅ॥
Kajinatū̃i ha ॥koṅ॥²

47
Nengay napū̃i ṭaikena,
Bir darū lekań goḍhanakana ॥koṅ॥
Nengay napū̃i bangaya,
Mat́ būrū mat́ sakam lekań batariānah ॥koṅ॥

48
ḍinḍa redom jarama redom, napanūm,
Boṛo redo napanūm sunūm jorotan ॥koṅ॥
Non nanam, noponanam,
Boṛo redo napanūm tuḍūnko tūka tan ॥koṅ॥

49
Tatań tikiṅ, jihań tikiṅ,
Chūḍhūkiṅ bonga tan goṛe, sasang banoha ॥koṅ॥
Sasang nakiṅ namehan, būlūṅ nakiṅ namehan,
Chūṭū nagoy nirihan,
Nūḍū̃i boleahan ॥koṅ॥

50
Nender burū reaṛi misingi jeṭe tichi, lolote,
Nekelan tana |k koṅ॥
Kana napui jeṭe, akana napui lolo,
Misiṅ go, laigo renge, dah go tentaṅ teha
Nekelan tana ॥koṅ॥

51
Nendor piṛi piṛite,
Hoy ho chire; gama, dudūgar tana ॥koṅ॥
Kana napūi noyo, akana napui gama,
Misiṅ here horen senotan, hoyo dūdūgar ॥koṅ॥

52
Būido senotan bareṅ,
Nūli baṛa chetanete būido senotan ॥koṅ॥
Chiṭṭi kulai ben bareṅ,
Nūli mata dipilaṅ chiṭṭi kulaiben ॥koṅ॥
Kaben chiṭṭi kulai redo bareṅ,
Kuṭi nūli sūbareṅh tol gojenah ॥koṅ॥॥²

53
Nale disūm dona misiṅ,
Jol beṛa gea misiṅ jolajagada ॥koṅ॥॥
Nape disūm doja misiṅ,
Rūgūt́ beṛa gea misiṅ ṭekora geaha ॥koṅ॥

54
Kūda nikir danḍika, chilikay,
Chili biliha kaben baṅṛasi ॥koṅ॥
Darū chetan cheṅṛe menay, koto-kotoy,
Chal baṛana, kaben toṭiha ॥koṅ॥

55
Dah do dah do, tentaṅ hintan,
Laido, laido, rengehiṅ tan,
Chimin saning reha repeṛeh, dahado namoha ॥koṅ॥²
Dah do namohago bareṅ,
Raja kore pukūri dai do namoha ॥koṅ॥
Rani kore bandelare dah do namo ha
Nihatih geh sanaṅiṅ,
Chakatiṅ geh mohanĩya,
Raja kore pukūri dah do ranjet́ jan ॥koṅ॥
Rani kore bandela dah do ranjet́ jan |k koṅ॥
(bareṅ go) chimin mate seteṅ ha dah do ranjet́ jan ॥koṅ॥
Nesai sari, bah pari, chimin mate seteṅha dahado
Ranjet́ jan ॥koṅ॥

56
Chetan pukūri, latar pukari,
Pan sakam doja bare lodobekena ॥koṅ॥
Dikū non tan recham, pan dom jojoma ॥koṅ॥
Raja non tan recham, pan dom jojoma ॥koṅ॥॥
Nesai sari, bapari dikū non tan rechama
Pan dom jojoma ॥koṅ॥

57
Nengań, napū̃y, menay redo,
Rūmatūlay, rūmatūlay, kaji seṭerah ॥koṅ॥
Nengań, napū̃y, bangaya,
Rūm tūlay, rūmatūlay, kaji banoha ॥koṅ॥
Rūmatūlay, rūmatūlay kaji banoha ॥koṅ॥
Nehasari, kenajah, bale bareṅ ॥koṅ॥
Bapari, kenajai bale bareṅ॥

58
Nam doja munḍa nera,
Būrū diri, noharado kam sesenah ॥koṅ॥
Saiū saga, noharado kam sesenah॥
Nengam, napūm, ṭaikena,
Burū diri noharadom nūja pachūṛa ॥koṅ॥
Saiū saga noharadom, niraja sesenah ॥koṅ॥
Nesari kena jah bale bareṅ ॥koṅ॥
Bahapari kena jah ḍūla misiṅ ॥koṅ॥

59
Meaḍege bale bareṅ, kinjiri raja,
Bheṭa bheṭa teben dhira dhirana ॥koṅ॥
Bheṭa kiṅ chibin, kaben bheṭakiṅ ॥koṅ॥
Samaṛom ganḍū rikiṅ rakabejanah ॥koṅ॥
Nesai, sari, bahapari,
Samaṛom ganḍū rikiṅ rakabejana॥

60
tū non koh tūrūiha, turūiha,
Sega non koh moṛea moṛea,
Sirma janūm jang chako jomatana,
Notereko le choṭe, leh choṭe॥

61
Naben doja bale bareṅ,
Ber benḍoṅ ber ber kaben nekelan ॥koṅ॥
ṭońa tapa kel, kel,
Kaben nekelan ॥koṅ॥॥
Dolaṅ seno hago bareṅ,
Dolaṅ biraḍago bareṅ
Berabenḍoṅ ber ber kaben nekelan ॥koṅ॥
ṭońa tapa kel kel kaben nekelan ॥koṅ॥

62
Bandha kotem senoredo,
Ṉoṛaḱn kotem senoredo,
Salūkat́ baṛa bareṅ, toṭaa darań ben ॥koṅ॥
Kaben toṭaa daharańado, kaben bheṭa daharańado,
Munḍa koh racha nuṭar baṛayaṅ,
Toṭagosoyaha ॥koṅ॥
Kolam lekan, rachare,
Chiṛa bapaḍeh ॥koṅ॥॥
Nehasari kenajah bale bareṅ ॥koṅ॥
Bahapari kenajah ḍūla misĩ. ॥koṅ॥

63
Barem racha poṛoso,
Nende sakam lena, punḍi, sakam-jana,
Sabin buginah ॥koṅ॥
Chetanete lipi, goh let́a,
Latarete noyo, goh let́a,
Johakan lipi, torosa, naṭa natuṛiń ॥koṅ॥
Nesai sari, bahapari.
Johakan lipi, torosa, naṭa natuṛiń ॥koṅ॥

64
Sohaṛopo, soṛopote,
Ranchi soṛopote.
Gelabar sao, nomineko, bahalejanah ॥koṅ॥
Chinḍih koi biḍeha,
Durabin koh neleha,
Danḍa koh tamea,
Jinjirih koh noh raha.
Mūka, mūkateko, seṭerelenah ॥koṅ॥
Bita, bittateko, seṭerelenah॥
Mongol mūndhi(sihabhūm) sima reko seṭerelenah ॥koṅ॥
Noṛo-noṛoheko panachaket́a ॥koṅ॥
Bigha bighayahako ṭakayaheket́ah ॥koṅ॥²
Nihatihaṅ geh sanaṅhi, chakatihaṅ geh mohanĩya,
Noṛo noṛo-heko, pana chaket́ah ॥koṅ॥
Bigha bighayahako - ṭakayaheket́ah॥

65
Bakaṛi jangi jangite,
Tiramitia karama kalūṭi natińetana ॥koṅ॥
Naloreh chirū sanḍim keche kechenah ॥koṅ॥
Tiramitia karama kaluṭi natiṅ hetana ॥koṅ॥
Nerame nelangateh, doramo dolaṅ teh, dhoramo saṅṛi doy,
Karama kokotet́ ॥koṅ॥
Dharama kokotet́ ॥koṅ॥

66
Nete putam ranado,
Diri richi, darureh gugūchūḍū̃iha ॥koṅ॥
Kana napūi, diri,
Kana napūi darū,
Jojoko, rūmbūlayareh guguchuḍuṅiha ॥koṅ॥
Nūli koh rumbū̃lay reh gugūchūḍū̃iha.
Bareṅ honaṅ menay redo, toṭe gasar meha chahe diri putam ॥koṅ॥
Tere goso meha, chahe, darū putam ॥koṅ॥
Nehasari kena jah bale bareṅ ॥koṅ॥
Bahapari kena jah ḍūla misiṅ ॥koṅ॥

67
Disūmedo gūle, gūle, rajedo mele mele,
Disūm chire, barengom nihatiń tan ॥koṅ॥
Neṅhaṅ mena recha bareṅ,
Disumedo bareṅ goy tinūlemeha ॥koṅ॥
Napūṅ mena recha bareṅ,
Rajedo barengoy kūlehemeha ॥koṅ॥

68
Bale singi tikin jana,
Bale chanḍūa ponai jana,
Nūkūrihatań singabonga, seday napū̃i doh ॥koṅ॥
Nūkurihatań singabonga, seday nengań doh॥
Chūilah kiṅ-senoy hana, chūilabano,
Nida reha kumu rikiṅ bageh ket́ीhaṅ ha ॥koṅ॥
Bheṭa kiń gehań metam,
Tebah kiṅh, gehań metam,
Bheṭayan somayareh, seday napuń menateh tiṛiṅ sabiha ॥koṅ॥
Tebayan dipilire, seday nengań menete kaḍhań sabiha koṅ॥
Nehasari kena jah bale misiṅ ॥koṅ॥
Bahapari kena jah ḍūla misiṅ॥

69
Bale redo, ḍūla redo, dūbi kūṭi,
Jobarah leka sayatem nehalaha ॥koṅ॥
Nara janań, darū janań, kudako,

Kana napūi, nipi piyūṅ,
Kana napūi pipi piyūṅ,
Bale misihaṅ tańachana dongobekenah ॥koṅ॥²

Nelo tanam dikū rani,

Mayaṅ redo gulaṕ saṛi,
Hay reh tań jūṛing, daya chigo dhoramo banoha ॥koṅ॥²

Bengon baṛi bhitor reh,

Pochimete noyo let́a,
Nana rokom, baṛa jūṛing baṛa pūṭab len ॥koṅ॥

Chiha tabū nahagako,

Jan kotem senoredo,

Nihatiń ॥koṅ॥

Boṛo balem tisar ket́a,

Liṭiṕ liṭiṕ nomo reha

Nama jūṛim namimeh,
Banteredo pyari sãsar reha sukū karem nameha ॥koṅ॥²

Hay goṛe tań siń boga,

Jonom nenga napu kiṅ bage natūḍiń |k koṅ॥

Biti baba banoha,॥
Siń bonga, namatr nūḍūṅ nūḍūnteṅ nara maraṅg len ॥koṅ॥²

134
Nelo tanam komol baṛa,

Chakaṛa kore selaṭi ārasi,
Sire sire bale somadoni,

Kakasakam tinjhar bonjhor,

Kili hale somodi, nūdūben meh ॥koṅ॥
Jati hale somodi jagarenameh ॥koṅ॥
Kili halem nudūbenareh,
Jati halem jagaren reh,
Nale kili kili dole kili misameh ॥koṅ॥
Nale jati jati dole jati tala meh॥

Nūli go baṛa len somadi,

Nūli mata samay somadi,

Kaben kaji kūlaṅe redo,
Kaben dili kūlaṅe redo,
Met́ mocha jaket́ somadi kareng nepelah ॥koṅ॥²

Nesel berelagom somadi,

Naben sūmat́ nago somadi,

140
Mihaḍege bale bareṅ, punḍi jota tegayameh bale bareṅ ॥koṅ॥

Raja kore chator teh, chatoratu ben ॥koṅ॥²

141
Tiṛidom banadūr basū,
Kaṭa dom banadūr basū,
Kulakoh lekam neloha, nĩa doń boroyatan ॥koṅ॥

Singi chirem jomĩya, nidam jomiha ॥koṅ॥
Bareṅ honaṅ menay redo, toṛ toṛ topoṛeh toṭe gasarameh.koṅ॥
Birala balaṅ, kapi teh maa benḍo meh ॥koṅ॥²

142
Bamonahaṭi oṭaro piṛ 'nochana, '
Chonadon bhonj raja projako dukū tana ॥koṅ॥
Bicharako ben, nacharako ben 'nochana '
Bhonj raja, dukū sūkū, nisū būgin bicharako bena.
Munḍa koh racha, komol baṛa,
Baṛayageh sanaṅhiṅ nisu būgina,

143
Namo somadi gaṛa parom,
Nĩo somadi nai parom,

Burū redo kula mena,
Gaṛa redo bĩa mena
Naūri hale dhonir beṭi, misa telaṅha ॥koṅ॥
Bariha jibon mihaḍakete, kūla bĩa koa talayate,
Jūṛi telaṅ senoha dhonir biṭi ॥koṅ॥
Misa telaṅ senoha dhonir biṭi ॥koṅ॥

144
Din munḍi, beṭayahana,
Iskūl doko chūṭihana,
Dolabūh halai, jūṛiṅ koh, nabū disūm teh ॥koṅ॥
Nokoy toraṅ gaṛa parom,
Nokoy toraṅ burū parom,
Nimin gebū jagarah johar jūṛing koh,
Soben koha baū dada koh,
Nujūa tanah koh, menateh toraṅ nora rekoha ॥koṅ॥²

145
Sida korem dinaḍah tan reh,
Dimasi pūṭao malin leka jabagem singaren ॥koṅ॥²
Nah gapa, tisiṅ barasiń,
Dimasi pūṭao malin baṛa mayate gosotan ॥koṅ॥²
Nen dūraṅ jagar lagit́,
Mon kotem gondiṅ reom,
Nari baṛa leka doh sakiṅ karem gasaroh ॥koṅ॥
Bing, ḍonḍa leka sakiṅ karem nūrihoa ॥koṅ॥

146
Nengam, napūm, noṛah reh,

Nanar, nońar, ṉoṛaḱ redo,
Naṅa torasareh sakiṅ meḍadam joroy ha ॥koṅ॥
Kaji chanal dūraṅ kote, naben reha sūman,
Komal baṛa, naloben gosoy ha ॥koṅ॥²

147
Munḍa ko rachare-bar joṛa komol baṛa koṛo
Nakanah ॥koṅ॥
Mihat́ baṛa nil baṛi,
Napiā baṛa jangūt́ jangūt́,
Baṛa nel nelete jiṛi doh naya tan ॥koṅ॥
Bakaṛi tat́a koh soben mūli,
Jangi tat́a koh joto mūli,
Baṛa naka nah metam, nesū sundori ॥koṅ॥
Nen baṛa pūṭao len reh,
Ponai chanaḍū dipilaṅ,
Bakaṛi jaket́ somodi, marasaloha ॥koṅ॥²

148
Bale singi jangūt́ jeṭe,
Chilikate bale jibon jilaḍeta nah ॥koṅ॥
Nońo tichi, jeṭe teh jilaḍeta nah ॥koṅ॥
Boṛo bale, panḍū jana,
Met́ hir hiratege kareh nele jom ॥koṅ॥
Soṭa saṕ saṕ tege norah senetan ॥koṅ॥²

149
Hūṛing hetem maraṅ liḍing,
Paṛab buddhim neto liḍing,
Hayareh tań, baba gom, bage natūḍiń ॥koṅ॥²
Bage reben, bage natū̃i,
Seno reben seno tuhań,
Sorogoreh, baba goń, beṭa rūā ben ॥koṅ॥
Bepeṭayan somay reh,
Tebayahan somay reh,
Siday noniṅ menete, tiṛi sabiṅ ben ॥koṅ॥
Pail noniṅ menete, johar telań ben ॥koṅ॥

150
Komol baṛa jūṛĩyekiṅ,
Nijū tanay menate toraṅ, noray nelatana ॥koṅ॥
Johar telay meh jūṛing,
Gatimere tiṛi sabakete johar telayameh ॥koṅ॥
Panati kote senakete jūṛi,
Metań meh ॥koṅ॥

151
Nimin bugin disūm tabū,
Burū kote, gaṛa kote, bakai nakanah ॥koṅ॥
Sona kote, rūpa kote,
Singaraka nah ॥koṅ॥
Nen disum talah reh,
Bidesi noṛoko sūkū nametan ॥koṅ॥
Marabū tigunah,
Sona, rūpa, senotan neṭa disūm teh ॥koṅ॥
Sona, rūpa, tingui lagit́,
Marabū nūṭanah hagań marabū nūṭanah ॥koṅ॥
Sona rūpa, senotan, neṭa disūmateh ॥koṅ॥²

152
Chetanoha–—koh magh akana,
Lataroha–—koh magh akana.
Jūh maghe senomeh, latar disūm teh ॥koṅ॥
Kalom maghe rūhaṛameh, neka dipilaṅh ॥koṅ॥

153
Nimin maraṅg jeṭe singi,–
 baṛa nasi tan juṛiṅ,
Bakaṛite bolon meh, baṛakoh salay meh ॥koṅ॥
Baṛam toṭea kere jūṛiṅ, baṛam goso kere jūṛiṅ,
Nisi boh, dohasi boham, chiṛa nalaṅ ha ॥koṅ॥
Lama jaṅ ṭaka sikam, sati nalaṅha ॥koṅ॥

154
Sirma redo siń bonga,
Note redo note nage,
Bariā tih panti keteṅ joharetanah ॥koṅ॥
Siṅh bonga nama nutūm roṛiṅ hejanah ॥koṅ॥
Bale redo ḍūla redo,
Nenga koyoṅ sukūreh tohań nūh kenah ॥koṅ॥
Nara janań, darū janań,
Siūa paiṭi rege din doh bitab jan ॥koṅ॥
Siń bonga nama nutūm jaket́eṅ riṛiṅ he ket́ah ॥koṅ॥
Boṛo, bale, mata jana,
Meḍe hire hire kareṅ nelejom ॥koṅ॥
Siń bonga nama nutūm jaket́eṅh riṛiheket́ah ॥koṅ॥

155
āyar tam doh, maraa leka,
Senatam doh hoṅaso leka,
Naben lekan sūrat sundari kare namiha ॥koṅ॥
Boṛoṅ redo soān sunūm,
Naki panakanam soṛopo leka,
ārasih teh nelenameh met́ mocha, chirem sundorih ॥koṅ॥
Sorogeh teh boloreho,
Patalete bolo reho,
Naben leka sūrat sundari kareh namiha ॥koṅ॥²

156
Chońabasa pital rūtū,
Kalimaṭi kiūt́ banam,
Nańe lote pital rūtūm bada badiha ॥koṅ॥
Nańem paḍū kiṅaere,
Nańem bebe kiṅaere,
Namaloteṅ senoaha, dasi renganań ॥koṅ॥²

EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

158
Singi nol, singi nasūra
Boṛo kandū, kaṭa chambara,

Kabū nira tuha jūṛiṅ, kabū bageha tūha jūṛiṅ,
Nitirakan menahḱ, jūṛiṅ disūm tabū doh ॥koṅ॥
Abu geh horoyaha, abugebū jangiha,

156
Būṭ kolom, kalay kolom,

Masūri jaṅa doh putam tiki jomeha ॥koṅ॥
Kalae janch doh putam nata jomeha ॥koṅ॥

161
Siṅhabhūm jilare, kolhan ho ko bakaṛireh,

Tara baṛa, koṛo tea, tara baṛa puṭab tana,
Tara baṛa puṭab hakan, tara goso tan ॥koṅ॥
Tara baṛa roa tana, tara baṛa gasar tana,
Samarena bapari, gasar nenḍatan ॥koṅ॥
Baṛay noṛo koh, nijū reho,
Hitae noṛo koh seṭer reho,
Gonoṅ teko raka tat́, kako nemeah ॥koṅ॥
Gãsi, dikū, nidi jom, samategeha ॥koṅ॥

162
Dorapon reh numbūl doja nelo tana nisū moja,

Chimin chiminam nele netanah ॥koṅ॥
Misab. Geja kam tunaḍūi, neka geja kam bage,
Chimin chiminam nele netanah ॥koṅ॥
Repo otam ḍūl joha, sukūi ohatam, jūre samang,

163
Sorasoti maṅ-go, maṅ,

Champa koṛo go rama tam,
Mūrabaṛa leka ge, komachaṅohago tam ॥koṅ॥
Mage chanḍū seṭer lena,
Chondon burū noyo duṛar, niṛiṅ he jana ॥koṅ॥
Koṛo bah ko puṭab lagit́,

164
Dolabū sakiṅ, dolabū jūṛiṅ, burū tebū senoha,

Bah bū goṛa, bah bū gutū, sanḍi sikihum ॥koṅ॥
Yen burū reh gupi tani, meh naya, nondo non,

Sūsūnabū, dūrang yabū, jih būh rãasah ॥koṅ॥

Nūli chūṭakay riha bareṅ,

Guli, tuṭi, menaredo,

Tū̃ija lopoṅ-taimeh bareṅ nisir chenḍo doh ॥koṅ॥

166
Baria kiṅ pampal none kiṅ, miḍe jūṛiyakiṅ pampala

Koṅ, nende punḍi ha ki pampal none kiṅ ॥koṅ॥
Dia sengel hapanūm boṛo bale do ॥koṅ॥
Nalo reh pampal non, sati gojena ॥koṅ॥
Sari sari sarite nalo reh pampal nonem,
Sati gojena ॥koṅ॥

167
Dhoramo singi turūū jana,
Nida chanḍūa nasūr jana,

Nora koteṅ seno redo,

Kareṅ bagenago somadi, seday jūṛiṅ piriti kareṅ
Bage na ॥koṅ॥

Meḍadaa joroyaha ॥koṅ॥
Nimin sanĩy riha singi, komal baṛa prem doha

168
Natanahḱ sūt́ chūṛa dah doh,

Rila mila tana metam, jolo molo tan ॥koṅ॥
Tiṛi redo sanka mena, kaṭa redo nandū menahḱ,
Gasar gasar tena ben nayub singi jan ॥koṅ॥

169
Jilib nipil jūṛiṅ, Sirma rimil rema jūṛiṅ,

Rūpa leka maresal nekam nirenetan ॥koṅ॥
Nurū būn būn nono retanah ॥koṅ॥
Bahako bakaṛi, bahako tonḍaṅ, sohan kumbaḍūntana,
Nurū būn būn nonoretanah ॥koṅ॥
Bahako nelate bulatan,
Noṭaṅ cholaṅ tanalekay susūn bihūratan ॥koṅ॥
Bah kili mili puṭabahakan,
Jenga, punḍi, tara nil, tara sasangatan ॥koṅ॥
Miracha milūṅ, malan nurū, sala, sala,

170
ūri gupi, sihūa paiṭi, disūm rea prem maya,
Kagem nadanah ॥koṅ॥
Tiṛi retam, mohan bãsi, ocha nora natomaimeh,
Nalom neseḍih ॥koṅ॥
Brindaban burūyate baṛań gutūha ॥koṅ॥
Jamunate senotan daagoy dupila ॥koṅ॥
Nimin bugin landa, jagar,
Naben gochi torang goh bãsidhar doh ॥koṅ॥
Naben gochi torang goh muralidhar doh ॥koṅ॥

171
Gaṛa doh gaṛa nijū jana,
Nai koh chireṅ sabah, nerayaṅ notaṅha ॥koṅ॥
Nai koh chireṅ sabah nerayaṅ notoṅha ॥koṅ॥

172
Homo perea singar mena,
Gun tam doh sundar kūṛi, nedel baṛa,
Nedel baṛa redo somadi rasi banoha ॥koṅ॥
Rasi bano lagit́ somadi, dūbiren nūrū jaket́ kage
Bihūren ॥koṅ॥

173
Sen akat́am richaṕ rochoṕ,
Landay tanam gereh meseh,
Naben toraṅ doh somadi dikū none kiṅ ॥koṅ॥
Naṭal baṛa sapa somadi, marachi mata jūngūt́ jūngūḍa
Nekan kolo bepeṭarecham jagar sanaṅh ho ॥koṅ॥

174
Natū kuṭi bandha jagadah reh,

Baṛa goh nel nelatege,
Singi jaket́ pyari nasūrejanah ॥koṅ॥
Kare beṭabaha pyari, baṛay kusi baṛa doh kare
Beṭabaha ॥koṅ॥²

175
Nape dope munḍa, tana nape dope kisan tana,
kapara tepe dal taṭa, niṭana baṭa dirina pinḍigi.
Nale dole renge tana,
Nale dole rabaṅ tana,
Saihū tele dala taḍha, tungūi lūsūi rachanaha
Joborah ॥koṅ॥

176
Nam doh jūṛiṅ nengam menay,
Nam doh jūṛiṅ napūm menay,
Kadal sakam leka gem gihal gopolah ॥koṅ॥
Nań doh jūṛiṅ nengay bangih,
Nań doh jūṛiṅ napū̃y bangay,
Sim Hon leka meṅ chiaṕ, chiabah ॥koṅ॥²

177
Nender piṛi punḍi noṛa,

Mara somadi dūraṅ hakom,
Kūṭi kūṭi tereho dūrangahakomeh ॥koṅ॥²

178
Ṉoṛaḱ tape chatar noṛa,

Chator ṉoṛaḱ nelakete meḍadah jorotan ॥koṅ॥
Selaṭi lekan racharem, benaja binū̃ha ॥koṅ॥

179
Latar pukuri, chetan pukuri, chetan pukūri, nil singi baṛanaha

Dhonireh beṭi konań boro tetanah ॥koṅ॥
Noṭo serom seno reho, nilasingi baṛanah jūṛiṅ baṛa
Bapaḍeh ॥koṅ॥²

180
Mon doy kehai tan jūṛi,

Keha dore kehai tana,
Nenga napū jotonadoh karekoh jotonaben ॥koṅ॥
Nenga napū joton doh, pūkūri naṛi kūbi leka
Din geh jotoneh ॥koṅ॥²

181
Nora koteṅ senotan reh,
Naṭia koteṅ senotan reh,
Nender noṛo 'nende doh ' menatem metań ha ॥koṅ॥
Napū̃y hoge kuday jom kena,
Nengayaṅ hoge kuday jom kena,
Yenamenateh somodi nĩa doń nendeha ॥koṅ॥
Nengay hoge baṛi jom kena,
Napū̃y hoge baṛi jomakena,
Yenamenateh somodi ninch doń neselai ॥koṅ॥²

182
Chetan soṛopo, dūlūi lopoṅ,
Latar soṛopo dulūi lopoṅ,

Maghe nelem nijū lena,
Porob nelem nijū lena,

Bage chanabare miḍem boyo ṭi.
Latar ota bage saniṅ singi tur nasur mena mitaḍa
Gahaṭi॥ koṅ..
Singi tur nasur mena meat́ gahaṭi.
Maya chabab.aṅ miḍem gahaṭi rea numu gati jagarama
Tan॥ koṅ ॥
Gahaṭi rea numu garti jagaram tana..
Bulūṅ chanab aṅ bagem nitir akan mena garti baria
Burū kiṅ koṅ,..
Nitir akan mena gati baria burū kĩ.
Bos kandarū payate haṛiy akan gati udhar bhara
Nayate॥ koṅ॥
Haṛiy akan mena gati udhar bharanayate.
Nepa burū terapa burū maraṅ gaṛa gongo re bas akan
Mena gati bonga mandir ॥ koṅ..
Bas akan mena gati bonga mandira.
Sebaiṅ sanaṅ menai honaṅ guṛ gotom bano taiya chikaĩ
Sebaiya॥ koṅ॥
Guṛ gotom bano taiya chikaiṅ sebaiya॥
